website_summaries.verdict: This oversized bedrest provides the ultimate back, neck, and head support along with a few unexpected features.
pros: Large design covers entire upper body
Zipper access to high-quality memory foam for adding or removing fill
Includes one large back pocket and a side pocket
Neck roll is detachable and adjustable
cons: A few customers felt the pillow was lumpy and reported a chemical smell upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny...WOW!
customer_reviews.text: MY mom likes to watch tv in bed but was always worried about her posture—she has osteoporosis and her pillow just made her slouch too much. Got the Husband Pillow for her for Christmas and she LOVES it! It’s much taller and provides better back support. The added neck pillow is buttoned in and can be adjusted, so you can get it at just the right angle. Plus there’s a big zipper on the bottom so you can wash the cover...her other pillow didn’t have that. I just tried it and wow...looks like I may be ordering two more for my husband and I! Guess we’ll see how it holds up over time...keeping our fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy for 5’8 260 pound male
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow to use on my bed for watching tv. I’ve never had a bed lounging pillow before but I thought I’d give it a chance because the advertising pictures made it look so comfortable. It really is! They said give it 24-48 hours to decompress out of the box, but after fluffing, I was using mine in about ten minutes! It just had that funky factory smell that most things with foam have, but after a few days the smell is completely gone. I really love this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dorrough

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable upright support following surgery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this husband specifically for upright support in bed following abdominal surgery. It took over 24 hours for the foam to expand, but despite this delay, the pillow with its well/designed arms and removable neck pillow proved to be a good size and height for me to be supported comfortably and to get some rest while in an upright position. A lot cheaper than investing in a hospital bed. Add a handrail to tuck under mattress and you have a perfect combination to solve the problem of getting out of bed and resting upright while in post-surgical recovery mode.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hachey

customer_reviews.title: Supportive Backrest + Your Purchase Supports Ocean Cleanup Project.
customer_reviews.text: Supportive backrest - memory foam cradles your back with a comforting warmth. The seller included a free gift with my purchase - a nice surprise. In a follow up e-mail, I learned that " a portion of every single purchase is donated to the Ocean Cleanup Project" - a foundation that develops technologies to extract plastic pollution from oceans around the world. Buying a great product and helping to clean up our oceans is a win-win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow for sitting up in bed!
customer_reviews.text: Received the pillow vacuum packed, and it did take 2 days to fully expand and shape up as pictured. I also "kneaded" the pillow to help push and pull the shredded foam stuffing apart to help with the expansion. The pillow is heavy and substantial; however, don't expect to use this pillow without a headboard or wall as a backstop, otherwise you'll probably just roll over backwards. I find this pillow to be a substantial upgrade to the foam wedge and standard bed pillows I was using previously to prop myself up in bed to watch tv. I'm happy with the purchase, and expect to get many years of use from this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jatlh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This item was far larger than I had envisioned, in the best possible way. It is considerably larger than other similar pillows I've come across, so it's actually able to provide the support I wanted, unlike the similar ones. I'm able to fully sit up in bed with it and read, listen to music, or watch TV. The removable cover makes it very easy to clean. I can't speak to it's durability just yet, as I've only had it for a couple months, but again, the removable cover will sure help with it, as the issues with previous similar pillows have been that the stitching comes undone.
customer_reviews.author: Demonic Noodles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect large size back rest for bed
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a large, firm backrest for the bed to help with a medical condition which required sleeping in an upright position. This backrest does the job, keeping the body upright throughout the night and providing enough support with its memory foam stuffing in the pillow. Very comfortable and it comes in a variety of colors to fit the decor of your bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGuru

customer_reviews.title: and smells like mildew. On a positive note
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes based on the many positive reviews, but unfortunately the product I received is lumpy, did not fill out as shown (yes I followed the instructions provided), and smells like mildew. On a positive note, it is comfortable if you can get past how unsightly it is. I am returning it if I can manage to get it back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Just Eve

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced & waste of money.  No way to return :(
customer_reviews.text: Not a husband chair unless he's 5'8" or less. My husband is 6'4" and this was not large. I'm 5'10" and it barely fits. Arm rest was short and ineffective, feels lije a glorified bean bag type chair. Cheap, no attachment neck roll...it comes loose and you can attach with buttons. Total garbage for that much money!!Go to Target and you can find same thing for less. No way to return. It was sent vacuum packed else I would return!
customer_reviews.author: Farm

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t use it much, but when I did ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use it much, but when I did, it did the job. The problem is quality. This product would’ve been 4 stars but the pillow head rest tore off. For an item this expensive, I expect it to hold its own. Updated 7/7/2018: On the listing, it says that the pillow has a three year warranty. So I thought I'd give it a try and reach out to the company of my issue. They were able to remedy the issue promptly. Their customer service was concise and quick. They sent me a new cover so that I could replace it to fix the issue at hand. Will do business with this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pineapple

customer_reviews.title: Read in bed?  This pillow a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pillow! It was expensive, but if u have a back like mine, worth every penny Very big, firm , heavy! I read and color in bed, andbthis is best one I’ve tried Cleaning easy fabric really nice!
customer_reviews.author: EYESMILE

customer_reviews.title: a much enjoyed gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my college student daughter who now has a comfortable back rest while doing school work on her bed. It showed up vacuum packed so after it was opened we just had to wait for it to inflate. That took a little while but once it was done it was very comfortable. I got a chance to test it myself and I am looking into getting one for myself now. Seems to be well made. Still new so we will see how it wears
customer_reviews.author: Henry Hammond Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big and comfortable! Very good quality! Easy to take the cover off to wash. I like that you can purchase other colors for the cover!
customer_reviews.author: tim woodworth

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow in our RV to provide support
customer_reviews.text: The husband pillow was the only pillow large enough to provide a comfortable sitting place in our RV bed to watch TV. Because the "headboard" of our bed is the curving slope of the front of our RV, we needed a supportive and large husband pillow. We tried another brand but it was way too short. We put a regular bed pillow behind the husband pillow and used the roll pillow that came with the husband pillow for neck support. This combo allows us to sit up in bed and read or watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PILLOW!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had surgery and could not sleep lying down so I ordered the Husband pillow. It was a life saver. Now everyone in the family wants one. Great back support and so comfortable. I could not have made it the last few weeks without this pillow. I showed a friend and she ordered one and of course I had to buy one for my daughter. Great product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Friend

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like a chemical dump. Not a healthy thing to have your face resting on
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Falcione

customer_reviews.title: Big and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly what I hoped it would be. It smelled a bit chemically out of the package, but i threw it in the dryer and that went away immediately. I'll probaly buy another after my wife steals this one away from me, lol.
customer_reviews.author: mcoe11

customer_reviews.title: Best reading pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is the first reading pillow that was tall enough to support my whole back and neck. Most end mid-back. The neck roll is great. I use a small pillow for lumbar support with this. The husband pillow also works great as an incline pillow if you turn it around on its back. I’d actually prefer if the arms were taller. To use the arm rests, I had to put another pillow on top of them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Primm

customer_reviews.title: Great bed pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some support for reading in bed and found it with this pillow. I searched dozens of different makes and models online and ultimately decided on this one based on size, other positive reviews and the fact that it is made in the USA. This pillow is supportive. When I first began using it, I thought it was almost too hard! Glad I gave it a few tries before taking stuffing out as now it seems perfect. Seems it adjusted naturally to my body shape.
customer_reviews.author: K Umphlett

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth it?  YES!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I am in grad school and spend SO many hours in bed, propped up and working. This is SO much better than trying to build Mt. Pillowmanjaro to prop up to only find then scooching or sliding into the wrong place. I am BEYOND pleased with this purchase. Opened it up and let itself fluff dor 24 hours. Nice and firm with tons of support. Going to buy one for my teenage daughter for when she studies, too!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Van Loon

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bed pillow.I had my doubts about this but it is the best bed pillow I've ever had. Just the right amount of firmness and the detachable head rest is great. Not crazy about the "husband" pillow name, though. The only people I know who use bed pillows are women . . .
customer_reviews.author: Glasgowgrl

customer_reviews.title: I use mine daily
customer_reviews.text: I sit in bed every day while working on my computer in my room. (I work from home.) This pillow makes my work very comfortable. I do have back issues, and this pillow still makes my work very comfortable. I highly recommend these pillows over others like them if you spend much time at all sitting up in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Dawn Akers

customer_reviews.title: Bed School 2020/2021 !!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who prefers to sit up and spread out on his bed rather than sit as his cramped desk for virtual learning from home. It's a very high quality item. Glad I spent a bit more on this than the other pillows of this kind. (Can we come up with a new name for them?) The company even quickly sent us free fluff to fatten it up a bit. Washable cover and adjustable neck support. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: The smell is very bad.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually post but this item forced me to post for health reasons, I wanted to like the pillow but the smell made me very very sick. So sick that I could not breath. Amazon returned it after my second call. I’m not sure what this is made of, but this cannot be healthy for someone to breath in. It burned my lungs and I was sick for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: In recent years, I've been using my bedroom as my office. To make it work I was taking every traditional pillow I had and stacking it up behind me Even then, the result was something that wasn't supportive enough. The Husband pillow (silly name, because anyone could use this) was the perfect solution. It provides a lot support and I can put it on and off the bed at will. The company even offered a free "tune up" with more fill for people who want extra firmness by providing extra fill material. I requested this and it was sent, free of charge, arriving several days later. Very impressive customer service. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Fandrew

customer_reviews.title: Crazy expensive but great back support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my daughter (5'11" 240 lbs) who is finishing college remotely and likes to work sitting up in her bed with the computer on her laptop desk. Since my daughter is a big girl, I wanted the biggest, firmest version of this pillow I could find and this is it. It wasn't cheap but her back is supported and that was the point. Much better than stacking some bed pillows behind you.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: Mine had no bad smell like some reviews say
customer_reviews.text: First of all, delivery was so fast, it arrived 3 weeks before I was expecting it. Secondly, the product itself is great. I was worried about there being a bad smell to the cushion because other reviews had said so, but there was no strong smell from the cushion at all - certainly it doesn’t smell like fresh, clean laundry, but there is no bad smell either. The filling is comfortable, not too stiff and not too loose. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miss L. Bloor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Pillow too stiff even after taking some filler out, which was a colossal mess and pain to clean up. Spent more vs lower priced ones because cover can be removed, which is feature I like. Neck pillow Is too wide/stiff, awkward positioning. Next insert isn’t zippered so filler can’t be removed without having it resewn, don’t like that about it. I’m using it without the cover. Stuffing into cover makes it very uncomfortable. For the cost. I wouldn’t recommend this product. I will buy a lower priced one next time.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of searching before finally deciding on which pillow I wanted to order. You can't even compare this to others, it is the tallest and most comfortable one without a doubt. They really nailed this one, it is perfect in many ways. You can adjust it in multiple ways, wash it, and it even comes with a free gift (an extra cover) if you sign up for VIP and leave a review. Looking forward to using this for a long time, it seems to e very durable. I just had a surgery (small bowel resection) and this has been helpingme recover comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: asafi@okstate.edu

customer_reviews.title: The best back pillow ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at this pillow for some time. My back gets sore while reading in bed using regular pillows. I finally decided to treat myself and order this. Oh my goodness, it is wonderful! It is so comfortable and supportive. The fabric is soft and high quality. I have been using it while in bed and on my sofa watching TV. It was well worth the investment. I am so glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingIsMyHobby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This product was insanely comfortable and easy to set up. Once the pillow inflates fully it becomes perfect for leaning against whether you put it against the couch on the ground or on top of the bed, the husband pillow gets the job done. I would recommend this product to anyone who is even thinking about getting it because you won't be disappointed, I love my husband pillow and I am sure you will too!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer G

customer_reviews.title: Great sitting pillow...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for support while sleeping upright from time to time. I do find the detachable head roll a nice feature, but the whole chair needs a bit of adjustment before use. Not a problem, just preference for my own comfort as the pillow in its natural stance isn't good on my back. Regardless, this thing is plush, soft filled, and easy to sit with or even lay your head on one of the arms if you want to lay flat. The neck roll can hang by elastic straps for mid back support, or detached for placement anywhere else. All in all, a good product, seems to be quality made as well.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: HUGE, HUGE, HUGE
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what it says. This backrest is big. Well suited for a taller or heavier person. This is not your garden variety musht light weight backrest. If you are looking for something substainal-- this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Guy

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The arm rests are rather mushy and seem to cave in towards the middle; the head pillow flops around, and is either too far back, giving no support, or pushes your head a little too far forwards. It is anchored with two flimsy strips of elastic. Will live with it as not sure since it is vacuum packed, I could get it into a box to return it. Should have been $30 less in price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, with soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is even better than I expected. It's worth every penny. I'm 5'3", and the back is high enough that I don't need to use the neck roll, which means I can use it under my bad knee or in the small of my back. The fill fluffed up in 24 hours with a little help from me, and then fluffed to full capacity a day or two later. This pillow allows me to leave the recliner I was confined to for bedtime, and move to the bed, still remaining in a sitting position. I bought the dark grey, and it matches the color shown online. I absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: This reading pillow is great. I was hesitant because my bed board is only 10” high but this was a non-issue. This reading pillow serves this 6’ 240 lb weight lifting trainer just fine. I almost sent it back before opening the box when I received it cuz it looked nothing like the pictured pillow. It's super compressed in a crazy tight thick plastic bag that kinda resembles a small pillow but when you break the tight plastic it doubles in size then 48 hours later it fully opened up. Very ingenious.
customer_reviews.author: Husk

customer_reviews.title: Firm support backrest for bed
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and spend my evenings in a hotel . The chairs in the rooms are seldom comfortable for watching TV or reading or even using my laptop . This husband pillow is a tall( I'm 5ft 9in ), firm pillow . Even the armrests are firm . The neckroll detaches and can be placed anywhere for support. It's very comfortable ! It arrived compressed , I shook it a few times over the next 48 hrs before using it ----like the instructions suggested . It has no odor . The material is very soft , but the husband pillow is "firm" support .
customer_reviews.author: Vera G. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Reduce the size of your chair; easily.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what is says it is. A most useful aspect is the shredded memory foam stuffing. If it does not fit well into your furniture, you can remove some of the foam and adjust it to your liking. It has allowed me to change the size of the seating area of my recliner in order to relieve my sciatica. Be sure to watch the video.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bed pillow. It is tall enough to support my entire back and head. It has a detachable small roll pillow that can be used to support the neck or head. I had no problems getting it to "fluff" out. I shook it and let it sit in the sun for a bit and it is great. It is pretty dense and substantial, does not squish down easily, so it supports my back for hours.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: This pillow turns out to best thing I bought for my bed. Being at home all the time now, this allowed me to easily sit upright in bed to read a book, watch tv, or work on a laptop. As long as the back is leaning against something the wall, it will give the perfect support. Note if you don't have anything behind it , it won't work well as a support especially if you are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppersEase

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because it came vacuum sealed and flattened out. But as the instructions said, after a little time and some shaking, it was nice and cushiony and comfortable. Really like the detachable head support and all the storage on the side of the arm.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiRoxy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Surgery Recovery & Reading in bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for recovering from surgery. I thought it would help keep me comfortable on the couch, and I was right! I'm glad I got this one. I also looked at other, cheaper, ones - but decided on this one due to the size and the pillow on top. I am SO glad I bought this one! I love having "two" sizes - with and without the top pillow. It is so comfortable on the couch, in bed, or even on the floor while watching tv or playing games. I'm very, very happy with this. It is not cheap, but it is worth every penny and more, in my opinion. I highly recommend this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: MN Mom

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones I remember from the 90s
customer_reviews.text: Its stiff once it plumps up after getting all of it out of the vacuum sealed back it comes in. Very stiff, but that's kinda what I wanted.. Its definitely just like I remembered with the old ones from the early to mid 90s that you cant find anymore. I am absolutely pleased with this pillow. Keeps you in position in bed sitting up, with a nice set of armrests. If you dont know what to expect from the original ones way back in the day than you wont understand. Excellent purchase, and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Plutonium

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is worth every penny! I use it as a chair back and as a side pillow when I lay on my side. Example can lay your head on one arm while the back and other arm contours to back and hips. I don't always use the headrest so I flip it back but it is used. When it arrives it has all of the air sucked out of it. Very carefully open the bag and air quickly fills the pillow. I put mine in front of a window on a sunny day and it helped speed it up. Awesome pillow. I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sejnost

customer_reviews.title: Next
customer_reviews.text: To soft for support. The bottom of mine is smaller then the top. Not comfortable. Can not sit up right in bed. Disappointing for as much as I spent
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase of 2020
customer_reviews.text: Let's set the stage: I'm a gargantuan 6'5" 240lb/109kg guy, yet this pillow reaches all the way up my back without having to slouch, it's huge! It inflated 90% of the way within the first few hours out of the box, and is now soft and supportive even without the optional extra foam fill for purchase. The microplush cover is warming but not sweat-inducing in a 75f/24c room, however my favorite distinguishing element is the arm rests - they're one of the tallest you'll find, which is paramount for those with higher elbows. The worst part about this pillow is coming to terms with the fact that your couch is now just something to lean it against. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine E. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from a multitude of back problems and have had 6 procedures on my spine. This has been without a doubt the best purchase I’ve ever made for my back. You have so much support and it is a total game changer. I have purchased others that ended up being donated or just thrown out. This is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor E.

customer_reviews.title: Very large supportive pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is huge! It's not for kids or small people. That's a good thing, it's roomy! The pillow does come compressed and I thought it couldn't possibly expand enough to fill out the cover, but after a day or two it was completely filled in. It is very firm and the arms are wide apart. The fabric is soft and the color as seen on the web. I don't use the neck pillow for my neck; instead I use it next to the arm as additional support. I'd buy it again even though it's really expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.author: M. Stott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support for sitting up in bed comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: I often read or watch TV in my comfy bed, but sitting up with pillows propping me up has always been an aggravation, especially the pillow supporting my neck because it tumbles down whenever I move. I resisted buying this because I didn’t want another thing in the way in my small bedroom, but I finally decided to order it. I’m glad I did! It made an immense difference in my comfort! It supports my lower back and my neck perfectly, and I love the pocket on the arm rest for keeping my remote and phone handy. I’m just sorry I didn’t order it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: River Mystic

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me -- someone who has no time to sit down in the office after a long day at work or just love to sit in your bedroom in the evening - this is by far one of the best investments for yourself you can make. I've struggled for hours over the years attempting to find a comfortable position while moving multiple pillows just to get some support -- only to have to move again as it settles into place.
customer_reviews.author: J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, this pillow is very comfortable, but once it fully expands, there is a gap between the person's lower back and the pillow, making it a bit uncomfortable after a while, especially for anyone with lower back pain or discomfort. For me, it is fine, for my wife, she has to put a soft small pillow behind her lower back to close that gap, which then makes it comfortable for her. Not a big deal and not worth taking any stars away from its rating, but something worth mentioning. Overall, very satisfied and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I have a one month old and breastfeeding and using pillows to prop myself up was starting to take a toll on my back. Even in our living room chairs none of them prop you up enough so I always had to use pillows behind me. This is the perfect height and gives good support whether in bed or on the couch and its tall enough to support my upper back too. I haven't had any back pain since I started using this and I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: I have bad arthritis in my back, and I was looking for something with support. After reading many reviews, I decided to purchase this. I am very glad I did. Although the arms are a little wide, the back support is great. The pillow at top detaches, and I tend to put it in the small of my back to give more support, and put my own pillow up by my head and neck. This works perfect. And, even when I fall asleep reading, I am comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good support
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure about the pillow because of the price, but once I got it and started using it, it was worth the price. I needed so support to do Computer work from home in a comfortable setting. This pillow did the trick by giving me better back support while sitting on my bed. It was easy to open and it fluffed up within a matter of hours from the vacuum seal it came in. Definitely worth it. The material is soft and color is nice
customer_reviews.author: Fun mom

customer_reviews.title: this pillow is great
customer_reviews.text: This back pillow is absolutely fantastic it is soft and extremely comfortable. Even my daughter and grandchildren love it because it is so comfortable if you are in the market for a comfortable and nice looking pillow look no further buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate comfort and great support!
customer_reviews.text: This was my wife’s favorite Christmas present. She reads every night in bed and she can’t stop telling me how much she loves her Husband Pillow. It gives her fantastic support and she says it’s incredibly comfortable. The arm rests are perfect - firm enough to provide comfortable support while reading or working on a laptop. It comes vacuum-packed and the instructions say to shake it and let stand for 2-3 days after removing it from packaging. I found that daily shaking and squeezing the lumpy parts did the trick in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Support for reading & in bed TV watching
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow after a couple of months of use. It is taller & more sportive than the shorter pillows found in department / big box stores. I really enjoy it while reading or watching television. Will purchase another one of these if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: great cushion!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my back pillow. I left it to fluff out for 48 hours before using it and was surprised at just how much of a difference that made. I use mine for back support when I am doing needlework in a really deep chair.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pillow knowing that I would have to sleep sitting up for over a week after dental surgery. This was the perfect solution. The fabric is soft - after 24 hours (I fluffed a lot reading the other comments) the pillow was ready to go. I am a small person so I also was able to swing the round pillow (attached only one side) under my arm to rest my arm while reading. I highly recommend this pillow for all sizes of people.
customer_reviews.author: BARB POWERS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a 6’ person; so comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: This husband pillow is AMAZING! I actually bought it for my husband for his birthday, and it exceeds all of my expectations. I’ve had flimsy pillows in the past, so I honestly had low expectations for the husband pillow, but the reviews were great, so I took a chance and bought it. My husband loves it! It’s y’all enough, a comfy width, and the memory foam insides are so supportive! I’m so glad he loves his birthday gift, and I’m going to order one for myself, as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Extraordinary Girl

customer_reviews.title: They went above and beyond
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a husband pillow and was not very satisfied because of the "gas" smell but after letting the company know it, they fixed the problem swiftly and completely by replacing it with a new and better pillow that didn't have that "gas" smell plus a small token of a free gift. I did not truly expect much because many companies try to fix a problem and nothing really gets done. However, they won me over. If this is how they treat customers when a problem arises, I hope they're in business for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: it definitely provides support for the neck, back and arms
customer_reviews.text: The husband pillow is very large and the material is very soft. It actually is a bit firmer than I would have liked, but it definitely provides support for the neck, back and arms. The color was as described on the website. As per the directions, the seat did reach its full size over a two day period and was ready to use with no problems. I think I need to remove some of the stuffing to reduce the firmness, but I have not done that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable pillow with plenty of support. I especially like the pillow on top that has multiple purposes. It's great for your head. So many of these type back rests are too short for your head. My only down note would be to have more foam in the side rests. I texted Oomph like they asked for more foam. I Received the foam and easily added it to the pillow. The arms are now perfect. This is my second one. Their customer support is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I promise you, YOU won't regret the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I literaly love this pillow, I read my bible using it at night and I could sit up-straight and comfortably. What I love about this husband pillow is that it supports your lower and upper back. **I also love the option to use the head support if necessary. Sometimes when I'm sitting on the couch I prefer to use the head support. I don't regret the purchase and wish I had made it sooner! I assure you that you won't regret it! Thank you ASPEN!!
customer_reviews.author: Essance

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. It is great for watching t.v. or reading in bed. It does arrive very flat but after 48 hours it is full, firm and back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brody

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase.  The Husband Pillow fully expanded withing 12 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, arrived quickly and the Husband Pillow was in perfect condition. It had fully expanded within 12 hours. There was a promotional code from the seller included in the package from the seller, Hit Notion, for a complimentary extra pillow cover for my item the: Husband Pillow - Chocolate, Big Reading & Bed Rest Pillow with Arms - Sitting Up Tall - Premium Shredded Memory Foam, Detachable Neck Roll on Bungee, Removable Covers & Zipper for Adjustable Loft Sold by: Hit Notion Product Thank you very much Hit Notion. I am already enjoying the pain relief from using my new pillow.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONIAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth. Every dime.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best covid-19 work from home buy so far. It came early and its soft but sturdy. It can hold my leaning without giving way. Great body support. I use the pillow roll mostly under my knees. When I first opened the smell of foam was really strong...but I fixed that by add my favorite scent to it. Great purchase. Worth every dime. And in my favorite color. Also seems pet hair resistant as my cat tried to claim early on. So happy it was available!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mother of all pillows!
customer_reviews.text: This is the mother of all husband pillows! Had a cheap one prior to the lockdown and daily use turned it into a lump. This pillow is high quality memory foam that holds its shape very well. You can tell by the weight, the finishing around the buttons and zipper that it’s built to last. This will last a super long time And really gives a lot of support. It’s also tall enough for my 6’ frame.
customer_reviews.author: Stoo

customer_reviews.title: Great support & comfort
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my husband, who likes to sit on the sofa with his back against the arm, so he can stretch out his legs. The problem with that is there's no back or neck support, & throw cushions just don't help. When I discovered the backrest pillow online, I was thrilled to find something that, based on other reviews, might actually work. Well, it does! My husband is very pleased with this pillow. My only concern, & this is just personal preference, is that the arms stick out a little too much. Other than that, this was a great find & I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Martha D. P.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is functional, but it is not filled with quality memory foam. Also the zippers and stitching are flimsy. I would pay $40 for something like this and feel it a fair deal. The current price is criminal
customer_reviews.author: Jere R Smith III

customer_reviews.title: neck rest is useless, heldnonnby cheaply sewn on buttons
customer_reviews.text: neck support is useless. let me start by saying I have not used either all that much. I use the actuall backrest much more and only have used the detachable neck rest a handful of times. The problem is the way the neckrest connects to the back pillow is by a piece of elastic and one sewn on button on each side. I'm always carefully and don't leave the neckrest ok when not in use because of the weight on the sewn on button. Putting it on careful like I always do one of the buttons came off. The neck rest is now useless and for the price of this it's very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: NICE SIZE AND EXCELLENT SUPPORT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this pillow! Excellent Support! I opened the package, shook the pillow a few times and then just let it sit for 2 days. I also love the neck/head pillow. Please note that there is a slight odor upon opening (which is normal), but that totally dissipates. There is no odor at all after letting it sit and expand. I've been telling everyone how much I love this pillow/backrest. I don't want to leave my bed! In fact I am leaning on it while writing this review! If you are on the fence I would say buy it. Follow the directions and you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Harper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the versatility
customer_reviews.text: I have an oversized chair that I love, but it's too big for me. I bought this pillow because the chair is so wide, I can't put my arms on the chair arms, and so deep that my feet don't touch the floor. I love that the makers of these pillows over stuff them, so that you can take out the extra stuffing and make if just exactly the fill that you need. It's taken me a couple of times, but I have it just the way I need it and I LOVE it. I just wish they also put a zipper on the inside part of the head rest so you could adjust that too.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great support
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I knew from the minute when I unwrapped packaging and it went poof, that this was it. I put it in another room, Came back 2 days later and it grew. Nice and stout. I had ordered one, right before and sent it immediately back. I had back surgery three days ago and since arriving home from hospital yesterday, I have spent all of my time on this pillow as it provides the support and position that I need for my lower back. Great cause too, as they are cleaning up our oceans with proceeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh so big and fat
customer_reviews.text: Much to large for what I wanted. My lounge chair is to long - buttocks to front where knees bend - so i needed a cushion - but this is to big. No other use for it. doesn't work on be - waterbed. Also I asked for brown and got blue cover. Cover is really to big for it. either as poor sew job or misfitted. not to happy for the price. I'll put into guest room. Lynda
customer_reviews.author: Lynda W. Wooton

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for this, I was expecting it to be more lush and comfy- Instead I'd describe it as stiff and dull. When you sit against it or put to much pressure on it the foam in the product shifts and flattens providing so that it becomes just this stiff soft layer. It doesn't hug you, it just provides a firm soft layer against whatever it's leaning on. After using it it doesn't return to it's normal state, it just stays how it shifted.
customer_reviews.author: OTTOVSCOOP

customer_reviews.title: not as bulky as it looks
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was a great size but provides absolutely no real support. There's not enough foam inside. It needs probably twice the amount of foam to provide the support it could. Everything else about it is great, it just doesn't do what it says. And the photo is false advertisement because it does not come that bulky even after you let it expand for a few days. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow For Sitting Up To Wotk In Bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best pillows of this type that I've ever purchased. It is larger than average and provides much greater support, including the headrest. I am very happy with it as it is much better than most such pillows for its intended use. The only negative comments I can make is that it is also heavier and firmer than the average pillow, so it is harder to move from place to place and you sacrifice softness for the extra support.
customer_reviews.author: HSimon

customer_reviews.title: My body frame is smaller than most.
customer_reviews.text: It is good and comfy.. however I am a petite woman, and I'd like a more fitted support for my back, I am using this to study while on my bed. I am in a shared housing unit and there is no desk in the house so I thought this would help keep a healthy posture instead of leaning forward into my books. It does the job, I just added a flat pillow to fill the space.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Penate

customer_reviews.title: The covers are very simple to replace and fit beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: I originally received my pillow as a gift from my husband when I had foot surgery. It served it's purpose perfectly when I was stuck in bed recovering. Made my stay much more comfortable. Had to replace my cover because my Boston Terrlor loved my pillow too and enjoyed chewing on it and tore the cover and messed up the zipper. Was pleased to be able to replace the cover. It was very easy to remove the old cover and replace it with the new one! Getting ready for more foot surgery and I know my Husband Pillow will help me stay comfortable once again! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: T. Grice

customer_reviews.title: so bad
customer_reviews.text: It smells terrible. It feels harmful to the body. It feels like I'm going to be poisoned.
customer_reviews.author: nodin

customer_reviews.title: Best by far.
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen a better backrest anywhere. I have owned this type backrest before and all of them were either to small or to flimzy offering no support. I got the Husband pillow backrest and was amazed at the weight and firmness and how it stayed in shape. When i used it to watch TV in bed I felt like there was good support for my back and love the adjustable detachable pillow that was included. Soft to the touch and comfortable to use. I would recomend to family or friends. Great product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Risley

customer_reviews.title: Firm pillow - no need for neck attachment.
customer_reviews.text: I went with this pillow because I liked that it had a neck pillow attachment - and that was a waste of money. If I could go back, I’d opt for a less expensive one without the neck attachment... That being said, it’s a very firm pillow that gives the back support I needed when I bought it. It’s not cushiony - it’s actually firm. When it came in, I took it out of the vacuum seal and shook it out and let it sit for a few hours, then I finished it off by throwing it in the dryer - it was a great combination and I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Husband Pillow This pillow is awesome. I have to sleep in elevated position and ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband Pillow This pillow is awesome. I have to sleep in elevated position and with this pillow I can sleep and wake without a backache or neck pain. There was a little problem with the pillow cover,but the company resolved that issue promptly. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MJS Killeen,TX

customer_reviews.title: It's Good.
customer_reviews.text: I do feel the quality is similar to the Walmart brand of these pillows, but it is much bigger, which I needed for my tall husband. They do wrap it very tightly and you will need to give it a couple of days to fluff out but note, cut carefully when opening so you do not cut into your Husband pillow. I can't say I can justify the price though other than the size of it. Just my thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Post operation comfort saver
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pillow, I just had surgery today and came home to this awesome pillow proped up in my bed, it feels like heaven sitting up against it. I'm not able to lay flat in bed because of pain so I can't wait to sleep up against this
customer_reviews.author: Jim E.

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the deal, when I think about what this should be, my mind goes to a soft memory foam pillow. This is not that. If you buy this and are aware that it’s a rather uncomfortable way to sit straight up in your bed, you’ll love it. If you buy it with expectations of luxurious comfort, you won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Crossman

customer_reviews.title: Big & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as tall as I expected, but with the pillow headrest, it's plenty big enough. It's nice and wide to fit larger bodies. I'm average and it's a nice fit. It fluffed up immediately out of the package, however I did allow it to air out, and fully fluff up, in the sunshine (as suggested) for a few days. It can also be placed in a dryer, cool setting. There is a slight odor at first, as indicated, but not repulsive as I've read in other reviews with other brands. Professional packaging and instructions and nicely made. Overall, I'm happy with this product and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caryl R

customer_reviews.title: My husband was jealous
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" and 165 lbs, average female build. I love this pillow. I use it to nurse my baby in the bed. Arm and neck support are perfect. I bought the light blue one....its a little bright but it looks exactly like the picture. It comes compressed, so be patient when waiting for it to puff up. I put mine in the dryer on cool for 30 mins and that did the trick. My husband was mad I didnt get him one.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived today. Shrinkwtapped, opened easy and is fluffing out nicely. The chocolate color is more of a milk chocolate, not a darker chocolate though. Fully unpacked and filled out good. I'm looking forward to vendors additional fill package though. This works perfect in my truck camper with dinette/ bed. I collapse the table, make the bed, then use the pillow and bed table as a computer desk. Really opened the space, no more rickety table, and great back support to work and watch tv. -Al
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Floppy waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely very disappointed. The pillow was not as well stuffed as advertised, so I have a very massive and unwieldy floppy pillow. In addition, the buttons designed to hold the headrest in place are poorly made and I've already lost one, so the headrest cannot be secured, so it also flops off to the side. Because this is too big to return, I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: J Clarke

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for comfort keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the comfort of this pillow. It was hard and not easily adjusted. The quality seems good but the choice of cushion material and flexibility have a lot to be desired. I was having neck problems and found this pillow very hard to find a comfort position. I finally abandoned this pillow and reverted back to using 3 pilled bed pillows. I would not recommend this pillow if you are looking for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fluffed right up, more so in 24 hours. Gorgeous color. I sit in bed because of several back surgeries. Great for watching TV, reading and especially coloring in the Mandela and books for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I got out of the hospital and needed some help setting up this is worth every penny comfortable malleable and made exceedingly well I would recommend this product to anyone I’m a 42-year-old male 200 pounds and this is held up wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Hikesalot

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this because of the high back for upper ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of the high back for upper back and neck assistance. The carry handle broke the same day while trying to fluff bedrest. Colors for the bedrest is soft and true
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Big but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with a sagging arm of the couch. It's not exactly right for that purpose because it is very large, but it is very well made, comfortable, and nice looking. I'd recommend it for anyone who wants a bed sitting pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: My wife liked this a lot for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: The pillow description is fair. It does exactly what we want. It comfortably lets my wife sit up in bed for long periods of time when she wants to watch TV or read. Better yet, she is no longer stealing my pillow. The pillow itself is large enough to be comfortable and provide ample cushion behind her (which is a log wall).
customer_reviews.author: Sir Keith

customer_reviews.title: 80 yr old grandma approves
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife to breast feed and for my 80 yr old grandma. They both love it and use it daily. My only problem is that the buttons to hook the head rest broke on both. Twice just seems like bad stitching. Would have been 5 stars if wasn't for that.
customer_reviews.author: Duy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable Back Pillow
customer_reviews.text: What I really like about this back pillow is just how comfortable it really is. In addition to it's comfort , it is provides an excellent level of support and the fabric is super soft. I especially appreciate the the dual armrests and detachable neck pillow. Keep in mind that not only can use this on the bed or couch, if you enjoy sitting on the floor this is a must have. Instead of taking it from room to room, I just ordered two. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Shaatal

customer_reviews.title: Color is a little off but certainly does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow so I could make my "work from home" spot in my studio (my bed w/ a laptop) a little more comfortable and I'm very pleased. I find the pillow to be supportive and comfy for work, and I've taken to lounging on it when I'm not. The red color is a little more warm/bright than the rest pictured, but this isn't really important as it does exactly what it needs to do.
